name: Ultimate Dark Crunchyroll v1.1
description:
Easier on the eyes while whatching/browsing anime (and now drama)
Was thinking of ading some anime stuff(characters) onto the page but I'm still in progress choosing who ><

Changelog:
v1.1
-Hid the huge ad-banner right under navigationbar
-Revamped the look of navigationbar to fit the new ad-banner free main page
-Intigrated sub-navigationbar into the main navi-bar
-Fixed black background on visited links and alot of other text objects(may still be one or two left)
-Corrected many small style bugs
-Small visual tweaks

To do:
-Recolor alot of site images with white background to transparent *sigh*
-Bug searching

BTW screenshots are stil v1 will provide v1.1 ones as soon as I get around to it
